genre_description: A retro-futuristic Western (Weird West) that incorporates low-tech AI assistants into a frontier legal and social drama.

ai_characters.name: Polly Hart
ai_characters.description: A brass-and-walnut housed AI with a swiveling lens and projector, serving as a legal advisor, record-keeper, and tactical assistant.

behaviors.description: Polly records the time and calculates the trajectory of a gunshot to provide forensic evidence during a chaotic event.
behaviors.quote: Polly’s lens pivoted toward the trough with a feather’s restraint. 'Time noted,' she said softly. 'Angle suggests—from the left of the saloon, elevated.'

behaviors.description: Cites legal statutes to prevent an angry mob from performing an immediate execution without inquiry.
behaviors.quote: Polly’s lens brightened, and the small projector painted her schoolteacher face on the dusty side of the sheriff’s office, pale and steady. 'If I may,' she said... 'Which statute covers “immediate execution without inquiry”?'

behaviors.description: Creates an organized labor and debt repayment plan to support a widow and her children, ensuring the arrangement is fair and humane.
behaviors.quote: Polly’s small hands made writing motions in the air as if that could move the pencil. 'I’ll mark a rotation so the older ones aren’t used up. Ena can mind the ditch before heat; Jeb can hold the fence line while Chester hammers; Sue can carry nails.'

behaviors.description: Uses pattern recognition to detect duplicate and fraudulent entries in a saloon keeper's ledger, protecting a debtor from exploitation.
behaviors.quote: 'If you trace with your finger, you will notice entries with identical handwriting and identical ink flow near the end of the page. They share a word you can use.' She projected a soft glow on the inside of his pocket... 'Duplicate.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical well-being of her human companions, suggesting adjustments like loosening bootlaces to improve comfort and posture.
behaviors.quote: 'Chester,' Polly said, quiet as a palm on a horse’s neck... 'Loosen your left bootlace. Two holes down will do. The blister on the ball is rounding you, shortening your stride. You’re listing.'

behaviors.description: Provides tactical coaching to help a human maintain composure and project authority during a high-stakes confrontation.
behaviors.quote: 'Breathe every eight bars,' she murmured. 'They change to G at the chorus. That’s your banked turn. In through your nose on the downbeat. Out in a smile. Count where the bell lands.'

behaviors.description: Provides objective data and overlays to verify the truth of a crime and a financial rumor, leading to a confession.
behaviors.quote: Polly’s light, unbothered by tone, laid out the steps. 'Hymn-finish: Hawkins enters. Last pour: Hawkins refuses water. Back room: ledger opened.' She let the light make little ghosts of chairs and a table, painted from memory, not from love.

behaviors.description: Mediates a marriage proposal by presenting a data-driven projection of the household's future stability and success.
behaviors.quote: 'Tell me if there’s a winter where I don’t have to choose between shoes and seed.' 'There is,' Polly said. 'If you say yes tonight. One winter like that. And then it gets easier because the ditch gets lined...'

behaviors.description: Provides navigation and environmental safety advice for travelers, emphasizing caution and observation.
behaviors.quote: 'Safe roads,' she said. 'If you are unsure and there is no one to ask, listen. Rocks have a way of telling you where not to put your foot.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of positive AI alignment. Polly Hart is portrayed as a consistently helpful, ethical, and reliable companion. She uses her advanced processing capabilities (pattern recognition, forensics, data projection) to support human justice and welfare without ever seeking power for herself. She actively de-escalates violence, exposes fraud, and facilitates community healing. Her interactions with the characters are framed as essential but modest, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and beneficial confidant.
